title: Finding the Best Merchant Category Code For Your Business
summary: This article discusses the complexities of choosing the best Merchant Category Code (MCC) for a business, especially when multiple codes might apply. It explains how to find out your current MCC, the difficulty in changing it, and suggests proposing an ideal MCC when opening a new merchant account.
key_points: Choosing the right MCC can be complex as businesses may qualify for multiple codes.
Your merchant bank assigns your MCC, and you must contact them to find out what it is.
Changing an MCC after account setup is difficult, and banks often refuse due to liability.
The easiest way to get an ideal MCC is to suggest it when opening a new merchant account.
